title: Full Day Paracas Ica and Huacachina from Lima All Included
description: Discover the serene landscapes of the Peruvian countryside on a full-day tour from Lima. See Humboldt penguins and sea lions on the Ballestas Islands, visit a local winery, and slide down the Huacachina dunes over the course of a day. If time permits, you can also make a stop in Chincha Alta to enjoy more experiences in the countryside. This small-group tour is a great way to enjoy local culture and beautiful nature.
all_descriptions: Discover the serene landscapes of the Peruvian countryside on a full-day tour from Lima. See Humboldt penguins and sea lions on the Ballestas Islands, visit a local winery, and slide down the Huacachina dunes over the course of a day. If time permits, you can also make a stop in Chincha Alta to enjoy more experiences in the countryside. This small-group tour is a great way to enjoy local culture and beautiful nature.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Islas Ballestas, Paracas 11660 PeruThey will visit as a first point the Ballestas Islands that have more than 50 species of animals highlighting the families of sea lions and Humboldt penguins. Here we will have a tour of the sea for approximately 2 hours, where we will explain about the famous "Candelabro" that we will see and about all the marine fauna that inhabits the placeDuration: 2 hoursStop At:Taqara 1856, Fundo Tres Esquinas 102, Ica 11000 PeruWe will then visit a "Nietto" or "Catador" winery, to try our national drink "Pisco" and drinks based on this liquor.. We will explain you the process of making the drink and you can end up tasting its fantastic flavor with good and fun typical toasts. We will have fun and have lunch here.Duration: 1 hour 30 minutesStop At:Huacachina, Huacachina, Ica RegionWe will arrive at the famous Huacachina desert, which has a beautiful oasis where we will walk. In the desert with the instructions of a specialized instructor, you will do the famous sandboarding( non-professional table) and have a ride at high speed on the buggies in the dunes of up to 150 meters. We will have a moment of great adrenaline and then we will enjoy the spectacular view to take photos.Duration: 2 hours
JW Marriott Hotel Lima, Mal. de la Reserva 615, Miraflores Lima 18, Peru
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.
provider:
Google. Google disclaims all warranties, express or implied, with respect to translations, including any warranties of accuracy, reliability, and any implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and freedom from forgery.
K M
1 contribution

NOT 'small-group'

Sep 2025 • Couples
It was no 'small-group' tour. We had nearly 30 participants.
So we traveled in a big bus which was crowded and the leg space was quite limited.
Not ideal for such a long day's trip.
To make matters harder for us, all of them except three (including us two) were Spanish-speaking people.
However, our guide Alvaro was very kind and took good care of us providing enough information collectively and personally in English.
They arranged a special pick-up/drop-off service for us as our hotel was out of the regular pick-up area. The arrangement was great thanks to the organizer Lucia. The only hard part was that the driver didn't understand English.

About the activities, the animals on Ballestas were not as many as I expected. The buggy ride in Huacachina was a great fun.
Written September 11, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Luana P
Toulouse, France7 contributions

It's worth it, there's no breakfast coffee

Sep 2025 • Couples
It's a hard day. We only had 10min in Huacachina, the time is all spent on the buggies. Make sure there is no coffee for breakfast. They make a stop and make you buy the hot coffee and only then explain that only snacks are included (and it wasn't Lays or brands mentioned in the ad, it was a very simple lunch box). The guide had a "low energy," unhappy, but knew how to give useful information. But the oasis experience is cool and worth it, as well as seeing the animals on the island.

Paracas and Huacachina Travel

Jul 2025 • Couples
The tour is excellent. The beautiful islands and very beautiful landscapes. The experience in the Huacachina desert was phenomenal. The communication with the Enterprise prior to and during the tour was magnificent and I like that very much. Our Armeth guide was super professional, attentive, funny and quite accurate in its comments and directions. It made our experience deserted something apart from fun very enjoyable and carefree. I highly recommend Peru hop and especially Aymeth!!

Natalia E
1 contribution

Services not included, nor detailed, misleading advertising.

Jun 2025 • Family
$18 extra compared to other tours for a bottle of water and a juice from children. FALSE PROMOTION OF ALL INCLUSIVE , obviously in the trip advisor description does not appear that lunch is not included, nor that sand boarding is for lying down. They are literally the same services from other agencies, I talked to people on the tour, this reseller charges extra for services he does not offer.

To top it off, snacks deliver everything to you in the second part, after you have paid for our breakfast. All this you find out in an email, after you have already made the payment leaving you little time to cancel and try to schedule another service because of the urgency of the holiday times.

You can see that the positive feedback is from the experience, which is very worthwhile, but not from the reseller agency (not to be confused with transportation agency).

Avoid spending part of your day fighting with this agency in the middle of your family day.
Automatically translated
Written June 21, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Adanny Tours
Hola Natalia, en la descripción de la experiencia claramente indica que el almuerzo no está incluido y que las tablas para el sandboard son no profesionales, ya que hay requisitos para poder usarlos, todo eso está detallado en la experiencia, igualmente se lo enviamos a traves de mensajes por recomendaciones, la bolsa de snacks es surtida con varios productos no solo agua, nosotros brindamos un tour de calidad y lo seguiremos haciendo, nos comunicaremos con el soporte de TripAdvisor al respecto ya que cumplimos con todo lo acordado.
Written June 22, 2025
This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
KevinC1992
Cambridge, UK2 contributions

Overall, a good day excursion

It was a good full day excursion (4.30am pickup for us, returned maybe 6.30pm) to see these places. You're whatsapp-ed details before the day. Note that there was defo more than 15 ppl on this tour! (I would say double!)

There is a stop for breakfast on the way to the first stop. Got to see some penguins yay, but note sealions tend to be there in summer though we did see one or two! Lunch and pisco/wine tasting was nice, and dune-buggying and sandboarding was very fun!

All in all, a great day out, and a good way to fit these places outside the city of Liman in one day.
Written June 20, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
